name: Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker - Special Edition
storyline:
Playing as Captain Toad, you get to solve puzzles to save Toadette - who was abducted by a big bird. Later in the game, the roles are reversed.

The Super Mario series Toad amiibo will unlock a bonus game on almost every course where the player has to find Pixel Toad. Any other amiibo will give the player a 1-Up Mushroom, or randomly two 1-Up Mushrooms.
summary:
Explore over 70 tricky, sandbox-style levels in Captain Toad: Treasure. Track down the Power Stars by yourself, or have a friend join you for the adventure in two-player co-op!

The Special Edition includes:
- The Game
- Toad Amiibo
